Veterans returning home from Iraq and Afghanistan make up for some of the highest unemployment rates in the country. For the young veterans coming back from Iraq and Afghanistan, it's as high as 20 percent. We need to do better in terms of making opportunities to these veterans so that they can get jobs, good paying jobs, to provide for their families and start their own small businesses, Kirsten Gillibrand said.
